live_updates: This issue has been resolved, thank you for your patience.
Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.
32254.title: Jan 19 – Lethbridge | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Resolved)
